backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining authorization, approval flows, and data types for courses, resources, exams, certifications, shows, designs, achievements, and user progress.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PayPalâ€‘related frontend changes to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of numerous frontend files across components, pages, hooks, and UI sections.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theming, authentication-driven layout switching between landing, dashboard, and admin panel.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCours: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and deleting courses with module management. Integrates CRUD hooks and dialog-based forms.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDeplo: Admin panel section showing deployment environment info, canister ID, network status, and clipboard copy actions. Displays frontend and backend deployment details.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSetti: Renders admin settings UI with alerts, general configuration cards, and platform information rows.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUsers: Displays user approval stats and a table for managing user approval status with actionable badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeveloperG: Provides developer setup instructions using cards and accordion steps with code blocks.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Commun: Shows community discussions, supports creating new posts, and displays discussion detail modals.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Course: Modal for viewing a course, tracking progress, and completing modules with dynamic progress updates.
Lists available, enrolled, and purchasable courses, handling premium access and course detail modals.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Create: Modal form for creating a design with title, materials, and steps, using mutation to submit and close on success.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Design: Dashboard tab listing user's designs with create, delete, and material guide options, rendering modals and design cards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Fashio: Tab that fetches and displays fashion shows with status, collections, and a view button, handling loading and empty states.
Modal showing a course's levels, modules, and locked content based on user tier, with scrollable detailed sections.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Materi: Modal presenting an AI material guide with images, tips, and a list of affordable, sustainable materials.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Mentor: Tab describing the mentorship program with mentor/mentee options, images, and explanatory cards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Progre: Renders a progress dashboard showing points, certifications, and achievements using data from custom query hooks.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedCourseSe: Displays a featured course card for Fashion From Zero to Pro with badges, artwork, and navigation to the course detail page.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and a copyright note. Uses Tailwind styling and static assets.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, navigation, theme toggle, and Internet Identity login/logout handling. Supports admin badge display and route navigation.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Displays pricing tiers with images and plan details for free and premium options. Uses cards and badges to present features and pricing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile setup, capturing name, interests, and selected tier, then saving via API. Includes form controls, validation, and option toggles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity state and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous React Query hooks for interacting with backend APIs such as user profiles, admin tools, courses, and achievements.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, utilities, and custom aesthetic classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application, wrapping it with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Implements the admin interface with tabs for managing courses, users, deployment, developer tools, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDetailPage.tsx: Displays course details, handles authentication checks, and manages Stripe/PayPal purchase flows with session tracking.
frontend/src/pages/CourseStorefront.tsx: Fetches and displays all courses with filtering and highlights a featured course for navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the user dashboard with tier-based UI, hero content, and tabbed navigation for various user features.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows the marketing homepage with hero content, featured course, features list, and navigation to pricing and courses.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Clears pending purchase session data and displays a payment-cancelled message with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Validates Stripe or PayPal payment sessions, confirms purchases with the backend, clears session data, and shows success or error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL hash for routing and state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, implemented features, and pending requirements for payment integration work.
